```{r car-plot}
mtcars %>% select(mpg, wt) %>%
           ggplot(aes(mpg, wt)) + 
           geom_point() +
           geom_smooth(method = "lm", 
                       formula = y ~ x, 
                       se = FALSE) + 
           theme_clean() + 
           labs(title = "Fuel Efficiency and Weight", 
                subtitle = "Heavier cars are less fuel efficient", 
                x = "MPG", 
                y = "Weight (1000s of lbs)", 
                caption = "Henderson and Vellerman (1981)")
```
